1.0.0.name: connect20/LimeSpot_Common
1.0.0.description: This extension is going to be used for Integrating the LimeSpot TopPicks and Recommendation products features inside Magento. This will give more useful data to the users based on their Social Profiles on Facebook & Twitter.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
